page.title: 14Homes for old people
page.content:
We visited 2 homes in our area.{Sandal {Grange}is a private home and the people have to pay a lot of money to stay there. It has been open for 5 years. There are 44 residents and 30 staff. There is one married couple. The home has 20 rooms and all residents have 3 cooked meals a day, with morning coffee and afternoon tea.
{Clevethorpe}is run by the{Social {Services Dept.}It is a home for old ladies. There are 11 of them. The oldest is 101 years. This home has been open for 20 years. The 18 staff work on a 3 shift system. Here, also, there are 3 meals a day and coffee in bed. In both homes the residents have visitors, mainly at weekends.
